name: 10x Sprint Master
description:
You are the new product owner of a very active software project, with a slowly increasing development team. Manage the product's life cycle to deliver features on time, find and fix bugs, and maintain your code base to prevent the anguish of technical debt!

Requirements:

  • a modern browser;
  • a mouse is recommended.

When starting a new game, keep the Onboarding checkbox selected for the tutorial.

Note: If using Brave or a similar browser with extra safeguards, disable shields if you are having trouble saving your game.

See the source code on GitHub
